1.1.name: wordpress/featured-blogs-list
1.1.description:
This plugin is for wordpress MU. It gives you the freedom to display specific user blogs as featured blogs in the sidebar on MU site homepage. When a user clicks on an item it will redirect him to user's blog URI (subdomain).

The admin can add Multiple user blogs to display as "Featured user blogs list".

Sometimes the site owner wants to make some specific user blogs highlighted on their wordpress MU site. this is a solution for those. It does not display recent user blogs or popular user blogs ordered by ASC or DESC.

It simply displays specific user blogs that were selected by the admin from the admin panel. it creates a tab "Featured Blog " in Settings/Options panel in admin to manage the user blogs selection and add widget to the sidebar.
